description: A fully featured waterproof ski mountaineering jacket made for the depths of winter, deep in the backcountry. It delivers outstanding protection and warmth when you need it most by combining Gore-Tex waterproof technology with PrimaLoft® insulation.
name: Rab Khroma Volition Jacket - Mens

specs.key: 40D GORE-TEX® 2-Layer waterproof technology with insulated construction. HH
